title: K-3D - 3D modeling Animation Software
description:
K-3D is the free (as in freedom) 3d modeling, animation, and rendering system.It features a plugin-oriented procedural engine for all of its content, making K-3D a very versatile and powerful package.
K-3D excels at polygonal modeling, and includes basic tools for NURBS, patches, curves and animation. With its built in step by step tutorials, making realistic characters becomes a breeze!
